summary: A runaway asteroid dubbed "The Outsider" mysteriously begins orbiting the Earth and threatens it with lethal flying saucers.
cast: Claude Rains|Bill Carter|Umberto Orsini|Maya Brent|Jacqueline Derval|Renzo Palmer|Carlo D'Angelo|Carol Danell|Jim Dolen|Joe Pollini|John Stacy|Aldo D'Ambrosio|Massimo Righi|Giuliano Gemma|Annamaria Mustari|John Karlsen
keywords: psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|flying saucer|scientist|orbit
title: El planeta de los hombres verdes
